creator: ElecFreaks
title: Micro:bit Experiment 11: NeoPixel —— Elecfreaks Mirco: Bit Starter Kit Course
description: This project uses a Micro:bit to drive an 8 RGB LED NeoPixel Ring and create a rainbow color gradual change effect.
steps: Connect the hardware components according to the provided diagram, ensuring to connect the DI cable of the NeoPixel ring.
Open the Microsoft Makecode online editor and add the NeoPixel package to the code.
Initialize the NeoPixel bead by setting the pin, the number of LEDs, and the type of bead.
Use the 'show rainbow' function to create a rainbow color effect on the LED strip.
Use the 'show' function to display the color on the LED.
Use the 'rotate pixels' function to make the LED color move in a circle.
Download the code to the Micro:bit and observe the rotating rainbow color effect on the NeoPixel ring.
